description: President Emmanuel Macron orders an end to the much-criticised method for catching songbirds.
title: Glue bird traps: Macron suspends use amid EU row
title_page: Glue bird traps: Macron suspends use amid EU row - BBC News
maintext: "Member States may derogate from certain provisions of the Directive but only under strict conditions that are not fulfilled in this case, especially because most of the species captured are not in a good conservation status."
